items.title: World Economic Forum says it will take 100 years to achieve global gender parity—investment titan Lubna Olayan says we ‘cannot afford’ to wait that long
items.description: Lubna Olayan, an investment titan in Saudi Arabia, says research which shows it will take 100 years to achieve gender parity on a global scale must be...

items.title: Musk says he’s committed to being Tesla CEO for next five years
items.description: The Tesla head previously complained of 'great difficulty' jugging his CEO and government advisor jobs.

items.title: Fortune’s 2025 Most Powerful Women list is here
items.description: The annual ranking of the women leading global business is more competitive than ever.

items.title: Not just ‘slash and burn’—the real reason this major pharmaceutical company ousted 40% of its middle managers
items.description: In an effort to become more nimble, some companies, like Bayer Pharmaceutical, are getting rid of middle managers.

items.title: Meet the 10 CFOs on Fortune’s 2025 Most Powerful Women in business list
items.description: The list features 100 leading businesswomen from finance, tech, health care, telecom, retail, energy, and other industries.
